nodes.text: Lelli Hi was a female Nightsister who lived on the planet Dathomir during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Lelli Hi was a female Nightsister who lived on the planet Dathomir. At some point during the Galactic Civil War, Hi was imprisoned inside the Chamber of Banishment on Dathomir, where her life essence was trapped inside a large crystal. Sometime after 0 BBY, a group of spacers entered the chamber, causing Hi to be freed from her crystal. She then proceeded to attack them, but was eventually killed.
